name: A pair of supple leather gloves
data: It increases the users strength a good amount.
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'marksmanship'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'arrow handling'.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'steady aim'.
